ing: 1 1/2 fluid ounces Irish cream liqueur (such as BaileysÂ®)
1 1/2 fluid ounces peach-flavored bourbon liqueur (such as Southern Comfort Â®)
des: "I prefer to mix this in a martini shaker over ice to make it very cold before serving. Mix together and serve as a shooter, or double amount and serve over ice. If you prefer it warm, you can stir it into hot chocolate and top with whipped cream. YUM!"
ins: Mix Irish cream liqueur with bourbon liqueur in a small glass.
